public ListNode partition(ListNode head, int x) {
 // ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡éå†ï¼šæ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å°äºxçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
 List<ListNode> smallList = new ArrayList<>();
 ListNode p = head;
 while (p != null) {
 if (p.val < x) smallList.add(p);
 p = p.next;
 }
 
 // ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡éå†ï¼šæ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å¤§äºç­‰äºxçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ 
 List<ListNode> largeList = new ArrayList<>();
 p = head;
 while (p != null) {
 if (p.val >= x) largeList.add(p);
 p = p.next;
 }
 
 // æ‹¼æ¥æ–°é“¾è¡¨
 ListNode dummy = new ListNode(-1);
 ListNode curr = dummy;
 for (ListNode node : smallList) {
 curr.next = node;
 curr = curr.next;
 }
 for (ListNode node : largeList) {
 curr.next = node;
 curr = curr.next;
 }
 curr.next = null;
 
 return dummy.next;
}

#include <stdio.h>

void move(char x, char y)
{
 static int cnt = 0;
 printf("%d %c => %c\n", ++cnt, x, y);
}

void hanno(int n, char a, char b, char c)
{
 if ( n == 1 )
 move(a, c);
 else {
 hanno(n-1, a, c, b);
 move(a, c);
 hanno(n-1, b, a, c);
 }
}

int main( void )
{
 hanno(3, 'A', 'B', 'C');
 return 0;
}
